result.longName: Arena Bilgisayar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Arena Bilgisayar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the distribution of technology products in Turkey. The company also involved in the wholesale trading of office and consumer products, corporate products, printers, software, consumer electronics, and mobile phones and other mobile devices, as well as personal computers, by-products, and peripherals; online electronics retail and marketplace businesses; and sale of sensors and security camera products. In addition, it offers various solutions, such as automation and Internet of Things, server infrastructure, data center, Arena energy, cloud technology, and security solutions. Further the company provides Bulutum.com, an end-to-end cloud services platform with pre-sales and post-sales technical support, training, and payment facilities that helps business partners to create business opportunities at software and managed services; Pencere.com, a communication and interaction portal; Paynet that provides payment, collection, and financial solutions to B2B, B2B2C, and B2C companies in various sectors, such as construction materials, marine materials, paint, health equipment, musical instruments, machinery, spare automotive parts, and others; Agaranti, offers insurance coverage with Arena guarantee for various products comprising from electronic devices to household appliances; and financial services, provides financial solutions to B2B, B2B2C, and B2C companies in various sectors, such as construction materials, marine materials, paints, health equipment, musical instruments, machinery, spare automotive parts, and others, as well as technical, logistics, and Arena galaxy services. Arena Bilgisayar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
